title: Crime Alert 11.29.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.29.18
description:
Body found in the Hania Aquilar search.  Accuses Russian spy says solitary confinement deprived her of human contact.  Chris Watts sent his wife disturbing texts before he killed her.
